topic.title: Bootstrap Extensions
topic.shortdesc: Incorporate the Bootstrap Extension as a separate plugin to add additional functionality that may be useful but is missing from vanilla Bootstrap 5.x.

section.title: Extending Bootstrap
section.p: Bootstrap is designed to be extensible. Additional CSS and JavaScript libraries can be added to the generated HTML pages to allow for new Bootstrap components and extend Bootstrap classes. Similarly, the DITA Bootstrap plugin itself can be extended to process DITA files to create Bootstrap valid HTML to drive these custom components.

The DITA Bootstrap Extension is a DITA-OT plug-in which incorporates the Bootstrap Extension library and adds the necessary CSS and JavaScript - for sliders, whitebox galleries, parallax components, greyscale images and additional styling options the full documentation can be found here.
